Key Match Events: Jordan Hawkins is expected to have a breakout game due to increased offensive responsibilities with multiple Pelicans players out injured.
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 7-31 in their current season and 4-13 against the spread on the road.
The Hawks are 19-18 in their current season and 0-6 against the spread this season.
Expert predictions suggest the Pelicans may struggle defensively against the Hawks' three-point shooting.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zion Williamson and Trey Murphy are out for the Pelicans due to injuries.
Trae Young is a key player to watch for the Hawks, averaging career highs in rebounds and assists.The game is being played at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans.
